name: Infected Zombies Battle:Play Ultimate Vengeance Counter-Strike Frontier Dead of Survival
name_original: Infected Zombies Battle:Play Ultimate Vengeance Counter-Strike Frontier Dead of Survival
description:
Infected Zombies killed many people in the dark city and freely walking on roads , pick the guns and start shooting those deadly creature.

Big One can find you easily , be careful and do not waste time use all bullets.
